description: Variation of wording of conditions 3 (Levels) 4 (Materials) 5 (Hard and soft landscaping) 6 (Tree Protection and Method Statement) 7 (Green roof) 8 (Landscape management) 9 (Impact of foundations on trees) 10 (Ecology - Enhancements) 12 (Lighting Strategy - bats) 13 (Demol and Const Mgmt Pln) 14 (Delivery and Servicing Plan) 15 (Residential Car Parking Management Plan) 17 (Cycle Parking) 18 (Electric Charging Points) 19 (Contaminated Land) 20 (Air Quality Assessment) 22 (Extraction and Ventilation Equip) 23 (Insulation from noise) 26 (Surface Water Drainage Strategy) 27 (Thames Water Piling) 28 (Secure by design) 31 (Means of enclosure) 32 (Details of PV panels) 41 (PD Restrict - Telecoms) 42 (entering and egress arrangement) 43 (Waiver of liability and indemnity) and the addtion of condition 44 (Phased Development) pursuant to planning permission 20/1610/FUL dated 08/10/2021 for 'Demolition of existing buildings and redevelopment to provide 2no. buildings up to seven storeys high plus basement level comprising of 204 residential units (Class C3) and a food store (Class A1) with car and cycle parking, amenity space, refuse and recycling storage and associated access, servicing area, landscaping and boundary treatment'. Variations to include amending the trigger points of conditions to account for phasing of development.
